name: 2024 The 3rd Asia Power and Electrical Technology Conference
content: Conference Proceedings: Accepted papers will be submitted for inclusion into IEEE Xplore subject to meeting IEEE Xplore's scope and quality requirements, and submit for Ei Compendex & Scopus index. SCI Journal: Selected papers of APET 2024 will be invited to prepare extended version to: 1) Protection and Control of Modern Power Systems • ISSN: 2367-2617 • Journal Rank: Q1 • Impact Factor: 11 • Indexing: SCI, Ei, Scopus 2) Energies • ISSN: 1996-1073 • Journal Rank: Q1 • Impact Factor: 3.252 • Indexing: SCI, Ei, Scopus, etc.
organizers: Institute of Engineering Thermophysics, Chinese Academy of Sciences, PES and IEEE
